boat.full_description:
⛵ VIVID — A G.L. Watson Masterpiece

Where heritage meets craftsmanship.

✨ Designed: G.L. Watson (1886 design)

🏗️ Built: 2008 by Ocean Yacht Services, Poole, UK

⚓ Rig: Gaff-rigged cutter

📏 Length: 8.84 m | Beam: 1.93 m | Draft: 1.30 m

⚙️ Engine: 13.5 HP Beta Diesel

🪵 Construction: Strip-planked hull with GRP sheathing, teak decks, ash & iroko interior

🛏️ Accommodation: Four classic berths

A timeless union of 19th-century grace and modern craftsmanship — VIVID embodies the elegance of a bygone era with the reliability of today.

ClassicYacht #GLWatson #YachtDesign #GaffRig #TimelessElegance

YachtingHeritage #WoodenBoat #SailingBeauty
boat.name: Vivid
boat.short_description: Vivid is a replica of boat designed by GL Watson in 1886. She was built in 2008.
